note: This is an example of what your anime history JSON file should look like.
usage: Send this entire anime_history array in the 'anime_history' field of your POST /api/recommend request

anime_history.title: Cowboy Bebop
anime_history.synopsis: Crime is timeless. By the year 2071, humanity has expanded across the galaxy...

anime_history.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime_history.synopsis: After a horrific alchemy experiment goes wrong in the Elric household...

anime_history.title: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu
anime_history.synopsis: The 150-year-long stalemate between the two interstellar superpowers...

instructions.first_time_user: Start with at least one anime (your favorite) in the anime_history array. It should be the FIRST item.
instructions.adding_recommendation: After receiving a recommendation, add it to this array with your rating
